mapper.insert: insert into hotel_reserve (num, id, name,phone,honame,hrnum,roomtype,checkin,checkout,pay,totalpay,people) values(#{num},#{id},#{name},#{phone},#{honame},hrnum_seq.nextVal,#{roomtype},#{checkin},#{checkout},(select pay from HotelRadio where roomtype=#{roomtype} and num=#{num}),(select pay from HotelRadio where roomtype=#{roomtype} and num=#{num})*1.1,#{people})
mapper.select: select hr.num,hr.name,hr.phone,hr.honame,hr.hrnum,hr.roomtype,hr.checkin,hr.checkout,hr.pay,hr.totalpay,hr.people,h.img,h.address,h.tel from hotel h, hotel_reserve hr where hr.id=#{id} and hr.hrnum=#{hrnum} and h.title=hr.honame

select hr.num,hr.name,hr.phone,hr.honame,hr.hrnum,hr.roomtype,hr.checkin,hr.checkout,hr.pay,hr.totalpay,hr.people,h.img,h.address,h.tel from hotel h, hotel_reserve hr where hr.id=#{id} and h.title=hr.honame

select hr.*,h.img,h.address,h.tel from hotel h, (select num,name,phone,honame,hrnum,roomtype,checkin,checkout,pay,totalpay,people, ROW_NUMBER() over(order by hrnum desc) as rk from hotel_reserve) hr where hr.rk=1 and h.title=hr.honame
select h.num,h.title,h.locnum,h.img,h.address,h.tel,h.mapx,h.mapy , hit.foodplace from hotel h, hotelitem hit where h.num = hit.hnum and h.num=#{num}
